width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-9" value="" style="group" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="70" y="10" width="290" height="220" height="36.66666666666667" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-44" value="<div>Custom receiver (UDP?)</div><div>OR<br></div><div>Collaborator via DNS<br></div>" y="440.00000000000006" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="210" y="378.8888888888889" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X0Nqx2gZI60mmkoogXYA-10" value="<div style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-23" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-20" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.75;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-14" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-24" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.75;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;startFill=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" parent="1" source="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-11" target="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-44" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="290" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="340" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-46" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-44" target="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-65" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="230" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="280" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-18" value="Polling" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="260" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-65" value="<div>Extension</div>&nbsp;" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="340" width="90" height="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-68" value="<b>open("/etc/../../../../etc/passwd") ) || <font color="#00ff00">Implant ID<br></font></b>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="60" width="280" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-69" value="Submit events" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="165" y="290" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-70" value="<div><font color="#00ff00"><b>Implant 1ID</b></font></div><div><font color="#ff0000"><b>Implant 2 ID</b><b><br></b></font></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="565" y="365" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-76" value="" style="group" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="350" width="270" height="32" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-74" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=11;" parent="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-76" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="32" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="270" y="32" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-75" value="FW (block inbound TCP)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-76" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="89.48275862068967" width="150" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-78" value="<h1>Operation</h1><ol><li>The tester generates the implants with some auto-generated id(s) - one per implant<br></li><li>The client deploys that implant to start debugging the in-scope application(s)</li><li>The tester sends some payloads</li><li>Upon triggering an instrumented function, the implant generates an event and sends it to udp://redirector:1234 or wherever</li><li>The tester's Burp Extension polls the redirector (like we do with the Collaborator), receives the event and decrypts it.</li><ol><li>alternative workflow: the extension maintains a constant communication with the re-director, and the re-director simply forwards the event in real time</li></ol><li>After a given timeframe, the impant deletes itself (in case the client forgets to do it)<br></li></ol>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="365" y="520" width="485" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-84" value="BurpDB?" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="670" y="350" width="55" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-90" value="<b>Java.JDBC.rawQuery("SELECT password WHERE USER='' OR 1=1 --") ) || <font color="#ff9999">Implant ID</font><br></b>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="40" width="500" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X0Nqx2gZI60mmkoogXYA-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.121;exitY=0.019;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;startFill=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-86"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="213" y="430" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="155" y="218" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="170" y="490" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X0Nqx2gZI60mmkoogXYA-13" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.75;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.011;entryY=0.639;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-65" target="pQPw7Rpqv2EPHtM6OOjo-84"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ol.li: The tester generates the implants with some auto-generated id(s) - one per implant
The client deploys that implant to start debugging the in-scope application(s)
Upon triggering an instrumented function, the implant generates an event and sends it to udp://redirector:1234 or wherever
The tester's Burp Extension polls the redirector (like we do with the Collaborator), receives the event and decrypts it.
alternative workflow: the extension maintains a constant communication with the re-director, and the re-director simply forwards the event in real time
After a given timeframe, the impant deletes itself (in case the client forgets to do it)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 53px; height: 1px; padding-top: 378px; margin-left: 656px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.b: Java.JDBC.rawQuery("SELECT password WHERE USER='' OR 1=1 --") ) || Implant ID

switch.text: Java.JDBC.rawQuery("SELECT password WHERE USER='' OR 1=1 --") ) || Implant ID

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
